flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: When it bites withnits massive andnpowerful jaws, itfshakes its headnand savagely tearsnits victim up.
It is hard for itnto support its ownnweight out offwater, so it getsndown on all fours.nBut it moves fast.
Although it has anmassive body, itsnpowerful hind legsfenable it to movenquickly, even onnthe ground.
FERALIGATR intimidates its foes bynopening its huge mouth.nIn battle, it will kick the ground hardfwith its thick and powerful hind legs toncharge at the foe at an incrediblenspeed.
FERALIGATR intimidates its foes bynopening its huge mouth.nIn battle, it will kick the ground hardfwith its thick and powerful hind legs toncharge at the foe at an incrediblenspeed.
It opens its huge mouth to intimidatenenemies. In battle, it runs using its thicknand powerful hind legs to charge thenfoe with incredible speed.
It is hard for it to support its ownnweight out of water, so it gets down onnall fours. But it moves fast.
When it bites with its massive andnpowerful jaws, it shakes its head andnsavagely tears up its victim.
It usually moves slowly, but itngoes at blinding speed when itnattacks and bites prey.

ふだんは　ゆっくりとした　うごきだがnえものに　かみつくときはnめにも　とまらない　スピードだ。
평소에는 느긋하게 움직이지만n먹이를 물 때에는 눈에 보이지n않는 엄청난 스피드를 낸다.
Ce Pokémon à l’air pataud est capable d’attaquernà la vitesse de l’éclair pour mordre sa proie.
Eigentlich bewegt es sich langsam, doch seinenBeute greift es blitzschnell an.
Se suele mover lento, pero alcanza velocidades denvértigo al atacar y morder a sus enemigos.
Di solito si muove lentamente, ma quando attacca enmorde la preda si muove a una velocità incredibile.
It usually moves slowly, but it goes at blindingnspeed when it attacks and bites prey.
普段は　ゆっくりとした　動きだがn獲物に　かみつくときはn目にも　止まらない　スピードだ。
おおきく　ちからづよい　あごでnかみつくと　そのまま　くびをふってnあいてを　ずたずたに　ひきちぎる。
크고 힘센 턱으로n한번 물면 그대로 목을 흔들어n상대를 갈기갈기 찢는다.
Quand il mord avec sa puissante mâchoire, il secouensa tête pour déchiqueter sa pauvre victime.
Wenn es mit seinem kräftigen Kiefer zubeißt, schütteltnes seinen Kopf und reißt seine Opfer in Stücke.
Al morder con sus feroces fauces, mueve su cabezandespedazando salvajemente a su víctima.
Mordendo con le grandi e potenti mandibole, agitanil capo riducendo la vittima in brandelli.
When it bites with its massive and powerful jaws,nit shakes its head and savagely tears its victim up.
大きく　力強い　アゴでnかみつくと　そのまま　首を振ってn相手を　ずたずたに　引きちぎる。
おおきな　くちを　あけて　あいてを　いかくする。nきょうじんな　うしろあしで　じめんを　けってnものすごい　スピードで　とっしん　してくるぞ。
큰 입을 열고 상대를 위협한다.n강인한 뒷다리로 땅을 차고n굉장한 스피드로 돌진해온다.
Aligatueur impressionne ses ennemis en ouvrant sonnénorme gueule. Pendant les combats, il piétine le solnde ses puissantes pattes arrière avant de charger sesnadversaires à pleine vitesse.

Impergator schüchtert seine Feinde dadurch ein, dass es seinnriesiges Maul aufreißt. Im Kampf erschüttert es den Boden mitnseinen kräftigen Hinterbeinen, wenn es mit unglaublichernGeschwindigkeit auf seinen Gegner losrennt.

Feraligatr intimida a sus oponentes abriendo las grandesnfauces que tiene. En combate, golpea el suelo bruscamentencon las gruesas y fuertes patas traseras que tiene para cargarncontra su rival a una velocidad de vértigo.

Feraligatr spaventa il nemico spalancando la sua boccanenorme. Nella lotta pesta pesantemente il terreno con lensue possenti zampe posteriori per scagliarsi contro il nemicona un’incredibile velocità.
Feraligatr intimidates its foes by opening its huge mouth.nIn battle, it will kick the ground hard with its thick and powerfulnhind legs to charge at the foe at an incredible speed.
大きな　口を　開けて　相手を　威嚇する。n強靭な　後ろ足で　地面を　蹴ってnものすごい　スピードで　突進　してくるぞ。
